doc:
Dick Powell https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dick_Powell 0 Richard Ewing Powell (November 14, 1904 – January 2, 1963) was an American singer, actor, film producer, film director and studio head. Though he came to stardom as a musical comedy performer, he showed versatility and successfully transformed into a hardboiled leading man starring in projects of a more dramatic nature. He was the first actor to portray the private detective Philip Marlowe on screen. Richard_Ewing_Powell ( November_14_,_1904 – January_2_,_1963 ) was an_American_singer , actor , film_producer , film_director_and_studio_head . Though he came to stardom as a_musical_comedy_performer , he showed versatility and successfully_transformed into a_hardboiled_leading_man starring in projects of a_more_dramatic_nature . He was the_first_actor to_portray the_private_detective_Philip_Marlowe on screen .
